entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
